ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Checkbox sort in PG locates NULL & false differently
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? Extension to https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/4861 1b - false 1d, 1e - null ascending ![Screenshot 2023-01-19 at 2 25 57 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86527202/213414020-9c9f6b53-c2ef-4b8f-b348-4e04433a8a4f.png) descending ![Screenshot 2023-01-19 at 2 26 05 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86527202/213414062-9119d406-9297-4475-8cdf-9cebb46ffb93.png) ### Desired Behavior From user POV - false & null should be together For XCDB - we can mark default value for any new checkbox column to False instead of NULL ### Project Details https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/4861 PG database ### Attachements _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4882 from nocodb/test/column-multiselect refactor: tests better org & clean-up

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(api): set sort order of nulls re #4881 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
